title: Introducing: KYLO
body:
There’s some really gorgeous textures on this new EP from Toronto’s KYLO; shimmering, ethereal moments all built around lovelorn songwriting.

Check out a couple of EP highlights below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
